teacheasy.data

Class AudioObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.data.PageObject
      • teacheasy.data.AudioObject

  • public class AudioObject
extends PageObject
    Encapsulates the data that describes an Audio Object as defined in the TeachEasy digital lesson XML format. Extends the page object supertype.
    Version:
    1.2 13 Feb 2015
    Author:
    Sam Raeburn, Sam Hall

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class teacheasy.data.PageObject

        PageObject.PageObjectType

      Constructor to create the data object with the data parsed from XML.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AudioObject

        public AudioObject(float nXStart,
           float nYStart,
           float nXEnd,
           java.lang.String nSourcefile,
           float nStartTime,
           boolean nViewProgress,
           boolean nAutoPlay,
           boolean nLoop)
        Constructor to create the data object with the data parsed from XML.
        Parameters:
        nXStart - Relative X axis start position (0 - 1).
        nYStart - Relative Y axis start position (0 - 1).
        nXEnd - Relative X axis end position (0 - 1).
        nSourcefile - Source file path as a string.
        nStartTime - Start time (not used).
        nViewProgress - Control display setting.
        nAutoPlay - Autoplay setting.
        nLoop - Loop setting.
